item.title: 北美自由贸易已经再次伟大
item.description:

item.title: 在逃银行家可能在帮助俄罗斯企业躲避美国制裁
item.description: 一名被指控在摩尔多瓦策划了 10 亿美元欺诈案的在逃银行家似乎正在帮助俄罗斯的贷款机构和企业在制裁造成的支付问题中继续开展对外贸易。【原文：A fugitive banker accused of orchestrating a $1 billion fraud in Moldova appears to be helping Russian lenders and businesses to continue conducting foreign trade amid payment problems caused by sanctions.】

item.title: 意大利 Reale Mutua 公司希望在欧洲扩张中完成 10 亿欧元交易
item.description: 意大利保险公司 Societa Reale Mutua di Assicurazioni 正寻求通过并购在欧洲扩张，并准备考虑通过高达 10 亿欧元（10 亿美元）的交易来实现这一目标。【原文：Italian insurer Societa Reale Mutua di Assicurazioni is looking to expand in Europe through acquisitions — and it’s ready to consider deals of up to €1 billion ($1 billion) to make it happen.】

item.title: 部长称苹果公司接近达成解除印尼 iPhone 禁令的协议
item.description: 印尼政府一位部长表示，印尼即将与苹果公司就一项投资计划达成协议，该计划将解除 iPhone 16 在印尼的销售禁令。【原文：Indonesia is close to a deal with Apple Inc over an investment plan that would lift a ban on iPhone 16 sales in the country, according to a government minister.】

item.title: 李嘉诚的港口公司在特朗普威胁下 "致力于 "巴拿马项目
item.description: 亿万富翁李嘉诚在巴拿马的港口业务表示，在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普提出担忧之际，当地政府对该公司进行了审计，该公司承诺将继续在巴拿马运营。【原文：Billionaire Li Ka-shing’s port business in Panama said it’s committed to operating in the country, after local authorities launched an audit of the company amid concerns raised by US President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 泰铢创七月以来最长连胜纪录，但美国关税令其岌岌可危
item.description: 由于金价上涨和中国人民币近期走高，泰铢兑美元汇率正接近六个月来最长的单日涨幅。【原文：The Thai baht is closing in on its longest run of daily gains against the dollar in six months, thanks to buoyant gold prices and a recent advance in China’s yuan.】

item.title: 双威医疗集团为可能成为马来西亚多年来最大规模 IPO 挑选银行
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，双威有限公司已选择汇丰控股有限公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）和马来亚银行有限公司（Malayan Banking Bhd）等银行帮助安排其医疗保健业务的首次公开募股，这可能是马来西亚十年来最大的一次首次公开募股。【原文：Sunway Bhd. has picked banks including HSBC Holdings Plc and Malayan Banking Bhd. to help arrange an initial public offering of its health-care business, people familiar with the matter said, in what could be Malaysia’s biggest initial public offering in a decade.】

item.title: 利润前景黯淡，外国人抛售 50 亿美元印度股票
item.description: 由于对公司盈利增长和消费疲软的持续担忧，外国投资者重新开始抛售股票，印度股市似乎将进一步下跌。【原文：Stocks in India look set for further declines as foreign investors resumed selling shares amid persistent worries over company earnings growth and sluggish consumption.】

item.title: 瑞典垃圾邮件拦截器 Truecaller 对抗人工智能语音克隆
item.description: 瑞典的 Truecaller AB 公司是来电显示和垃圾邮件拦截应用程序的开发商，该公司正在部署技术，以应对越来越多的犯罪分子利用人工智能生成的语音克隆来诈骗电话用户。【原文：Sweden’s Truecaller AB, the developer of a caller ID and spam-blocking app, is deploying technology to counter the growing number of criminals using artificial intelligence-generated voice cloning to defraud phone users.】

item.title: 特朗普称仍将征收 10%关税后中国股市下跌
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示仍在考虑对中国商品征收 10%关税的威胁后，中国股市下跌。【原文：Chinese stocks dropped after US President Donald Trump said his threat to impose 10% tariffs on the nation’s goods was still being considered.】

item.title: 日本商业游说团在日本央行会议前指出物价走势积极
item.description: 日本最大的商业游说团体负责人表示，他看到了需求带动价格增长的迹象，在日本央行预计加息的前几天，他对通胀环境作出了乐观的评估。【原文：The head of Japan’s biggest business lobby said he sees signs that demand-led price growth is underway, in a bullish assessment of the inflation environment coming days before the Bank of Japan is expected to hike interest rates.】

item.title: 特朗普重申对华关税威胁后大豆下跌
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示考虑对中国征收关税后，大豆在芝加哥下跌，激起了人们对这两个最大经济体之间爆发贸易战的新忧虑。小麦和玉米也出现下跌。【原文：Soybeans fell in Chicago after US President Donald Trump said he’s considering tariffs on China, stoking fresh worries of a trade war between the two biggest economies. Wheat and corn also declined.】

item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德即将斥资 9.5 亿美元收购 Divvy Homes
item.description: 据一位熟知内情的人士透露，布鲁克菲尔德资产管理有限公司（Brookfield Asset Management Ltd.）即将达成一项交易，通过收购初创公司 Divvy Homes，以约 9.5 亿美元的价格购买 3800 套单户出租房。【原文：Brookfield Asset Management Ltd. is nearing a deal to buy 3,800 single-family rentals for about $950 million through an acquisition of startup Divvy Homes, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 日本央行向加息迈进，市场坦然面对特朗普
item.description: 在全球金融市场对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普重返白宫做出相对平静的反应之后，日本央行行长上田一夫有望在周五将利率上调至2008年以来的最高水平。【原文：Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda is on track to raise interest rates to the highest level since 2008 on Friday, after global financial markets responded with relative calm to US President Donald Trump’s return to the White House.】

item.title: 更便宜的电动汽车将考验印度人对油耗车的热爱
item.description: 当 Anant Vijay Kala 的前一辆车达到新德里严格的 15 年车龄限制时，他在一个较小的城市卖掉了这辆车，并用这笔钱为他的下一辆车提供了部分资金。他从未考虑过更清洁的替代品。【原文：When Anant Vijay Kala’s previous car reached New Delhi’s stringent 15-year age limit, he sold it in a smaller city and used the money to part fund his next vehicle — a gasoline-powered Skoda Kushaq. A cleaner alternative never came into consideration.】

item.title: 软银股价飙升，与 OpenAI、甲骨文合作推进千亿美元人工智能计划
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普宣布日本公司、OpenAI 和甲骨文公司将斥资数十亿美元在美国建设人工智能基础设施后，软银集团公司的股价最高上涨了 8.1%。【原文：Shares of SoftBank Group Corp. jumped as much as 8.1% after US President Donald Trump announced a multi-billion dollar push by the Japanese company, OpenAI and Oracle Corp. to build AI infrastructure in the US.】

item.title: 游说团体称爱尔兰经济在多年快速增长后将降温
item.description: 爱尔兰主要的商业游说团体称，受贸易不确定性和关键基础设施瓶颈等因素的影响，爱尔兰的经济增长将趋缓。【原文：Ireland’s economic growth is set to moderate due to factors including uncertainty over trade and bottlenecks around critical infrastructure, according to the nation’s main business lobby.】

item.title: 创纪录的牛肉进口量增加了中国实施贸易限制的风险
item.description: 中国创纪录的牛肉进口正在冲击需求放缓、价格跌至2019年以来最低点的市场，这增加了政府采取措施遏制牛肉贸易的风险。【原文：China’s record beef imports are hitting a market where demand is slowing and prices have fallen to the lowest since 2019, raising the risk that authorities will take steps to curb the trade.】

item.title: 特朗普发表对华关税言论后美元推高

item.title: 特朗普的关税威胁引发贸易战担忧，石油止跌回升
